text: Wide variety of different types of local and international food and supermarket products at low prices conveniently situated next to MRT station and bus interchange with walking distance to at lease 4 major shopping centres. Opens 24 hours for midnight and odd hour shopping. Friendly fast attentive cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students tourists Expats locals visitors and families.

I believe this Fairprice JE Blk 135 has the best aunty workers among all supermarkets. They are very knowledgeable about the food, discounts, offer, etc. At the checkout, they would advice you if there's offer, or only offer to members and ask if you have membership before payments. The aunty vegetables fillers can also discuss with you how to cook the vegetables if you are unsure.
This is what we call "Ren qing wei (人情味）"，only in Kampung you can find.
On the contrary Jurong Jem has totally lack of the warmth like these aunties. They are too urban, too cold. They insist to check on my IC if I am seniors for the mere 20 cents I saved. I am with full of grey hair. They said CCTV is watching, and many youngsters nowadays dye their hair grey. I took that as compliment!
I think almost all of the JE 135 aunties have worked there for more than 20 years! I hope the company will keep them as long as they are willing to work.

selling bad rotting fruit for special price. Some white nectarines are bad.
pics are a comparison. Normal should just be white inside. The inside of this bad nectarine is dark as the business owner.

This branch claims it has Coles Muesli in stock. I rushed over to this branch from far away to find that it's a complete scam. I'll be filing a police report over this scam that made me lose my time and money for LTA fares

Fairprice supermarket . Popular with local residents shopping for groceries . Located just beside Jcube shopping mall . One of the oldest supermarket in jurong gateway area and open for 24 hours daily b most of the daily necessities can be bought here . Beside it is a 4D betting lottery outlet . Usually with long queues snaking all the way to the entire facade of the fairprice oulet . There is many other shops nearby .
